properties.entry: INSERT INTO ENQUIRY ( ENQ_NO , USER_ID , ENQUIRY_TYPE , ENQUIRY_TITLE , ENQUIRY_CONTENT , ENQUIRY_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_ENQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE )

SELECT /* com.kh.notice.model.dao.NoticeDao#selectNoticeList() */ NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , USER_ID , COUNT , CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER ON(NOTICE_WRITER=USER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
UPDATE /* com.kh.notice.model.dao.NoticeDao#increaseCount() */ NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT /* com.kh.notice.model.dao.NoticeDao#selectNotice() */ NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , USER_ID , CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER ON(NOTICE_WRITER=USER_NO) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND N.STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE=? , NOTICE_CONTENT=? WHERE NOTICE_NO=?
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
